thread.title: 5 Cyber Security Threats For 2015

title: 5 Cyber Security Threats For 2015
text:
05 5 Cyber Security Threats For 2015 
Tech Cocktail: Currently, there are increasingly large numbers of cyber attacks in the nation. In fact, the FBI now ranks cybercrime as one of its top law enforcement activities. President Barack Obama, in his recently proposed budget, said that he would drastically raise the spending on cybersecurity to around $15 billion. From fraud and identity theft to commercial hacking assaults, cybersecurity has never been so important for governments, businesses and other organizations.
